description:
Roll up your sleeves and start building the ranch of your dreams! 

Nurture your horses to be the best of the best and compete with 'neyyy'-boring horses. Breed your horse with your friends’ and customize them any way you want! Spruce up your ranch to provide the ideal living space for your horses… With a stream pool and a corner track, there is no better place to call home! Watch them race in local derbies and compete for trophies in the championship! Go for the gold! 

CRITIC'S WEIGH IN: 
""...that’s part of what makes Derby Days stand out...the process of turning a fledgling racehorse into a champion is very satisfying."" - Gamezebo 

""As it is, Derby Days features nice graphics...the game also features a consistent notifications option, for those who love to take care of things just in time."" - DG! 

""The graphics are cute, and new content is set to be released introvenously, so there’s always something new to play with."" - Capsule Computers 

This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for extra items.

This game supports English, 한국어, Japanese and 中文. 

NOTICE 

-Now supports the new iPad. 
-Try the new betting system! 
-New quests & items up to Level 45! 
-10 more Championship races to participate in. 
-More chances to win Collection items. 
-Search for friends faster and easier! 

FEATURES 

- Millions of horses to discover! 
- Breed a new horse with your friend for an unexpected surprise! 
- Three levels of training facilities! 
- Beautiful buildings to customize your ranch! 
- Tons of animals to keep the horses company! 
- Vibrant decorations to make your ranch stand out! 
- Visit your friends and show off your prize horses! 

Connect with Com2uS! 

Follow us on Twitter 
twitter.com/Com2uS 

Like us on Facebook! 
facebook.com/Com2uS 

For information on new games and special events, check out http://www.withhive.com!
releaseNotes:
It's time to roll up your sleeves and train fabulous horses!

We've fixed up some minor bugs!

Have feedback? Leave a review or drop us a line at info@com2us.com
